sentences.en: Among assertive, learned, or eloquent people, she seemed to feel her dowdiness and insufficiency.
sentences.cn: 在这群过分自信, 学识渊博, 伶牙俐齿的人中间, 她总仿佛觉得自己过于懒散,笨头笨脑的.

sentences.en: Be assertive and spell out exactly how you feel.
sentences.cn: 要自信点儿，把自己的感受讲清楚。

sentences.en: Be assertive rather than bottle up your anger.
sentences.cn: 要坚定自信，而不是把愤怒藏在心里。

sentences.en: He is an assertive boy, always insisting on his own rights and opinions.
sentences.cn: 他是个固执的孩子, 总是坚持自己的权力和主意.

sentences.en: Her son was an energetic, assertive boy, always ready to argue.
sentences.cn: 她的儿子是个精力充沛而意志坚定的孩子, 时刻准备着争论.

sentences.en: I would be ground down between the Congress and the increasingly assertive bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 我将被国会和日益武断的官僚机构压挤得透不过气来.

sentences.en: If you want good relationships, you must have the confidence to be self-assertive when required.
sentences.cn: 如果想要发展成功的关系，在需要的时候必须有自信拿出主见。

sentences.en: John is an assertive boy, always insisting on his own rights and opinions.
sentences.cn: 约翰是个固执的孩子, 总是坚持自己的权力及意见.

sentences.en: Pointing directly at a listener is an assertive act.
sentences.cn: 直接指向听众是种过度自信、傲慢无礼的行为.

sentences.en: Russia is newly assertive, but is focused mainly on its own near - abroad.
sentences.cn: 俄多斯虽然近来有些强势, 但其工作重心仅在周边.

sentences.en: She tends to thrust herself forward too much , ie to be too self - assertive or ambitious.
The self - assertive element and the self - transcending element are antithetical.
sentences.cn: 维护自身因素与超越自身因素是相反的.

sentences.en: They begin to mute their voices, not be as assertive.
sentences.cn: 他们开始压低嗓门，不再那么肯定了。

sentences.en: Women have become more assertive in the past decade.
sentences.cn: 女性在过去十年中已变得更加自信。

sentences.en: You should try and be more assertive.

words.tran_cn: 断言，声明；主张，要求；坚持
维护，坚持；断言；主张；声称
肯定的；独断的；坚定而自信的

trans.tran_cn: 观点明确的，坚决主张的，坚定自信的；果敢的
trans.tran_en: behaving in a confident way, so that people notice you
